title: InstrumentCommonFields
description: Common fields for all financial instruments including identification, classification and basic attributes

asset.description: Identifies the commodity code that the instrument is linked to

assetDescription.description: Describes the commodity that the instrument is linked to

market.description: Market where the commodity is registered - 2nd level of commodity registration
market.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMarketCode

segment.description: Segment where the commodity is registered - 1st level of commodity registration
segment.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSegmentCode

tickerSymbol.description: Code that publicly represents the financial instrument in the market, used for identification and trading

collateralIndicator.description: Indicates the instrument that can be used as collateral in A5X

securityCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityCategory
